channel.description: Recent content in Golang on Park Sangkil Tech Blog

item.title: Golang Libraries
item.author: ht1911@gmail.com (Park SangKil)
item.description: A curated list of awesome Go frameworks, libraries and software https://github.com/avelino/awesome-go Go package for fast high-level image processing powered by libvips C library https://github.com/h2non/bimg A toolkit with common assertions and mocks that plays nicely with the standard library https://github.com/stretchr/testify Package goth provides a simple, clean, and idiomatic way to write authentication packages for Go web applications. https://github.com/markbates/goth Gostradamus: Better DateTimes for Go https://github.com/bykof/gostradamus Common golang code shared by multiple projects
item.dc:creator: Park SangKil
